text: Teletoon Retro was a Canadian specialty channel. It was owned by Corus Entertainment. It was based on the Teletoon programming block. The service was dedicated to broadcasting classic animated television programs as well as some live-action series. It was shut down on September 1, 2015. Category:Canadian television channels Category:2007 establishments in Canada Category:2015 disestablishments in Canada
title: Teletoon Retro
